title: Entire Six-Bedroom Karitane Home 30 Minutes from Dunedin with Direct Beach Access
description: Discover a secluded oasis of coastal charm and relaxed bliss at The Longhouse Tirimoana Whare Roa, a stunning home tucked away on the Otago coastline. Wake to waves crashing along the Karitane beachfront as you make a scrumptious breakfast and warming cup of coffee in the homeâ€™s country-but-elevated kitchen. Lounge with loved ones over homemade dinners in the impeccably styled dining area, and take in the beauty of this slice of paradise from the enclosed veranda.
offer_address: 1140 Coast Road, Karitane, East Otago 9471, New Zealand
